action.primary: Eliminates pathogenic Wind, clears fever, relieves spasms and promotes urination

indications: Scrofula, furuncles, pyogenic infections, hematemesis, prolonged diarrhea, dysentery with bloody stools, metrorrhagia, metrostaxis, leukorrhea

action.primary: Warms the Middle Jiao, circulates Qi and stops pain

indications: Cold due to Wei Qi Deficiency, cough, abdominal pain due to Deficiency Cold, fractures

action.primary: Tonifies Qi, invigorates the mind and tonifies the Kidneys

indications: Dizziness, weak extremities, spermatorrhea, impotence, irregular menstruation

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
This herb is effective for invigorating the Mind.
It contains a type of oil and bitter salt which warms up and reinforces the nerves, the Heart and Stomach and acts as a diaphoretic and diaphoretic.
This herb stops pain associated with hernias.
It is said to cure putrefactive and intermittent fevers.
Patients with excessive Blood loss are advised to take this herb.
